trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup"> </xref> händelsen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event can be canceled because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PopupEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>.
When you create a PopupEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en PopupEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
